item.title: Comment on Glaciers by Mom
item.dc:creator: Mom
item.description: I, for one, am happy you didn't see any bears unless from a safe distance!!! But I feel certain you'll see many ( fishing etc. ) before this journey ends!! Good post. Most of your entries leave me feeling hungry!
item.content:encoded: I, for one, am happy you didn’t see any bears unless from a safe distance!!! But I feel certain you’ll see many ( fishing etc. ) before this journey ends!! Good post. Most of your entries leave me feeling hungry!

item.title: Comment on Hit and Run by Little Pudge
item.dc:creator: Little Pudge
item.description:
My thoughts and prayers are with you for a safe and propitious resumption of your excursions.
Missing you desperately,
-LP Esq.
item.content:encoded:
My thoughts and prayers are with you for a safe and propitious resumption of your excursions.

Missing you desperately,

-LP Esq.

item.title: Comment on Firsts by Ruby
item.dc:creator: Ruby
item.description: Hi John-your mom told me about your blog. Happy ( not hippy ) to be in the loop. Hope you're having fun. Love, Ruby
item.content:encoded: Hi John-your mom told me about your blog. Happy ( not hippy ) to be in the loop. Hope you’re having fun. Love, Ruby

item.title: Comment on Firsts by Mom
item.dc:creator: Mom
item.description: Love the photos. I thought Hong Kong was awesome! If you have a chance, go have a drink at the Hotel Peninsula. That's where Dad and I stayed when we were there. Don't you think the harbor is beautiful with all the lights? And how do you like the food? Have you tried any 100-year-old eggs yet? Looks like great weather. Blog - great idea!!!
item.content:encoded: Love the photos. I thought Hong Kong was awesome! If you have a chance, go have a drink at the Hotel Peninsula. That’s where Dad and I stayed when we were there. Don’t you think the harbor is beautiful with all the lights? And how do you like the food? Have you tried any 100-year-old eggs yet? Looks like great weather. Blog – great idea!!!❤️❤️❤️❤️
